sounding 0.0.4101
  • Reference

Plot hodograph

Source: R/hodograph.R
hodograph.Rd

Plot hodograph to show changes of wind speed and direction in vertical profile

hodograph(u, v, hght, max_hght = 9000, lab_hghts = c(0, 1, 3, 6, 9), ...)

Arguments

u

u-wind wind vector components (m/s)
v

v-wind wind vector componente (m/s)
hght

vector of altitudes (m)
max_hght

max. altitude to be considered. 8 km used by default
lab_hghts

label of numeric vector heights in km to be signed on hodograph; default: 1, 3, 6; NULL for skipping labels
...

other graphical parameters to be used with plot() function

Examples

data("sounding_wien")
attach(sounding_wien)
   # changing wind speed and direction to U and V wind components
   # also changing units from knots to m/s
 u = round(-SKNT * cos(DRCT * pi/180), 2) 
 v = round(-SKNT * sin(DRCT * pi/180), 2) 


# finally plot the hodograph:
hodograph(u, v, HGHT)

#> [1] 1
#> [1] 2
#> [1] 3
#> [1] 4
#> [1] 5
#> [1] 6
#> [1] 7
#> [1] 8
#> [1] 9
#> [1] 10
#> [1] 11
#> [1] 12
#> [1] 13
